N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 487.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Consumer
product is defined in the New York State Penal Law, section 145.35, as "any
drug, food, beverage or thing which is displayed or offered for sale to the
public, for administration into or ingestion by a human being or for
application to any external surface of a human being."
(b) Tampering with a consumer product is
defined in the New York State Penal Law, sections 145.40 and 145.45. (c) Agency includes any State or local law
enforcement or regulatory agency which in the course of such agency's lawful
operation becomes involved in a consumer product tampering incident. (d) Consumer product tampering data base
(CPTDB) is defined as the computerized data base located at the New York State

Police Division Headquarters Crime Analysis Unit and operated by the Division
of State Police for information management and retrieval of matters involving
consumer product tampering. (e) Consumer product tampering telephone line is defined as the dedicated, unlisted
"800" telephone number used exclusively by agencies authorized to investigate
consumer product tampering. This line shall not be open to the general public. It shall remain available 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. (f) The New York Statewide Police Information

Network (NYSPIN) is the computerized system administered by the Division of

State Police as authorized by the New York Executive Law, sections
217, 218, 219 and
220. N YSPIN includes the equipment, facilities, procedures, agreements and
organizations thereof for the collection, processing, preservation or
dissemination of criminal justice information. (g) The New York State Police Scientific

Crime Detection Laboratory shall be defined as the Division Headquarters Crime

Laboratory, Building 22, State Campus, Albany, NY 12226; Mid-Hudson Regional

Crime Laboratory, Stewart Airport, Box 6065, Newburgh, NY 12550; Southern Tier

Regional Crime Laboratory, Park Street, P.O. Box 213, Port Crane, NY 13833; and

Western Regional Crime Laboratory, 722 Homer Street, Olean, NY 14760. (h) New York State Police troop headquarters. When used in this section, New York State Police troop headquarters or detail
headquarters shall mean the appropriate division installation listed below
